task.title: Add or Change Role Information and Role Types
task.shortdesc: Add or change role information and define role types for a role on the Description / Role Types page.

step.cmd: From the Role Administration page, complete one of the following:

ul.li: To add a role, select Add.
To edit an existing role, in the Description column, select the appropriate role link.

info.p: The Description / Role Types page appears.

note.p: The role name cannot be changed once the role is saved.

step.cmd: Optional: Check the Use This Role in Business Intelligence (Cognos) box if this role should be configured with user qualifiers for use in Business Intelligence reports.
Optional: Specify whether the role is a default role. Select one of the following:

ul.li: New Hire: This default role is assigned automatically to all new hires that are added through the UltiPro portal.
Terminated: This default role is assigned automatically to UltiPro portal users upon termination.

step.cmd: In the Role Type grid, select at least one role type to define the UltiPro features (Web Access) available to users assigned to this role.
Select the Web Access Rights, Standard Reports Access Rights, or Business Rules Access Rights tab to add or change other role information, as desired.

note.p: The Standard Reports Access Rights and Business Rules Access Rights tabs only appear if an appropriate role type is selected.

step.cmd: Select Save. The Role Administration page appears.
